channel.title: ScottHansonDE tweets

item.description: @faerirose @MCinHD @Heather_inDE We‚Äòre still in the US, but HAM-CDG-MSP with AF/DL went alright for us (separate flights 1 wk apart) with checkin night before, allowing 2+ hours for security (actual time 1 hr), and no checked luggage. One leg canceled on 48 hr notice but automatically rebooked.
item.source:markdown: @faerirose @MCinHD @Heather_inDE We‚Äòre still in the US, but HAM-CDG-MSP with AF/DL went alright for us (separate flights 1 wk apart) with checkin night before, allowing 2+ hours for security (actual time 1 hr), and no checked luggage. One leg canceled on 48 hr notice but automatically rebooked.

item.description: @jenrazzle Back in the day coming back from her TOEFL my wife tried to avoid the fine by speaking English to the ticket inspectors. Didn‚Äôt work.

item.description:
First leg of our lake lap (12/36 km): fields, lakeshore, cold brew https://t.co/EsCgFj8EWJ

Our trusty steeds, or as the bartender called them the other day, ‚Äúpedal bikes‚Äù https://t.co/WIPKo6xrFr

Second leg (28/36 km): town lakeshore, away from the lake for some prairie, then smoothies https://t.co/0gtfKiedHS

Final leg (36/36 km): beach, cornfields, country Swedish cemetery, and home https://t.co/DhG4N3dtjU

item.description: @ClaireSmith1848 @StandingTeacher It‚Äòs actually the rural grocery prices here that make me faint, even though I know German consumers prefer cheap food above everything else.
item.source:markdown: @ClaireSmith1848 @StandingTeacher It‚Äòs actually the rural grocery prices here that make me faint, even though I know German consumers prefer cheap food above everything else.

item.description: @Lynn_Nothegger Sounds like county fairs in the US. Winners go on to the state fair. Do country shows also have food booths (fried anything on a stick) and carnival rides?
item.source:markdown: @Lynn_Nothegger Sounds like county fairs in the US. Winners go on to the state fair. Do country shows also have food booths (fried anything on a stick) and carnival rides?

item.description: @HonourableHusba @Heather_inDE I usually think of MN and WI culture as being pretty similar (sports teams notwithstanding), but this gizzard juice has me wondering üßê

item.description: @RealMarkDziak @jenrazzle We recently ate at a restaurant that was not only cash-only but gave us a hand-written receipt from a blank memo pad. Imagine the Finanzamt will be paying them a visit sooner or later.
item.source:markdown: @RealMarkDziak @jenrazzle We recently ate at a restaurant that was not only cash-only but gave us a hand-written receipt from a blank memo pad. Imagine the Finanzamt will be paying them a visit sooner or later.

item.description: @HonourableHusba @jrsofty Our local Halal butcher has wonderful marinated skin-on boneless chicken thighs. He calls them ‚Äúchicken steaks‚Äù.

item.description: @davewiner German girlfriend wanted us to hitchhike from Des Moines to Minneapolis, since she hitchhiked all the time at home. Ended up with a creepy driver just out of prison. Never did it again.
item.source:markdown: @davewiner German girlfriend wanted us to hitchhike from Des Moines to Minneapolis, since she hitchhiked all the time at home. Ended up with a creepy driver just out of prison. Never did it again.
